page.shortlink: api client api a5 panellayout setstate method

argument.name: state
argument.description: The state object returned from A5.PanelLayout.getState.

page.description: Set the current display state of the layout and all its children. Can be used in conjunction with A5.PanelLayout.getState to restore panels to a previously cached state.
page.example: // assume pObj is a pointer to a panel class var state = pObj.getState();
